articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Bad Habit of Pulling up DPRK Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Bad Habit of Pulling up DPRK Flayed
						
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces under the DPRK National Defence Commission issued a statement on Tuesday censuring the south Korean group of traitors for their bad habit of pulling up the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 South Korea reportedly met the "greatest banking computer disturbance ever in history", in which the banking computer network of the "National Agricultural Cooperative Federation" has been put at the worst paralysis since April 12.
					
					 This case caused a great loss and south Korea experienced a hot agony of shame in the eyes of the world.
					
					 What is at issue is the fact that the group of traitors let the puppet Intelligence Service and prosecution finally announce this case as "done by the north" after making "joint investigation" into it for nearly one month.
					
					 What the group claimed as evidence to link the case with the DPRK is that the IP used in attacking the said computer network was identical with the IP of the DPRK Ministry of Post and Telecommunications and the attack was based on the delicate and accurate way of remote control whereby its attacker was supposed to be a special cyber unit. It also asserted that such attack was hard to be carried out without mighty human and material resources and this was not an attack for "gaining specified interests" such as stealing fund and data but repeated attack aimed at "indiscriminate destruction."
					
					 Its assertions are just absurd argument based on unreasonable ground.
					
					 Even the members of the federation hard hit by what happened, in actuality, refuted the announcement that "the north was responsible for the cyber attack" as a "hasty conclusion" as it lacked scientific accuracy. Even the Defense Security Command of the puppet army known not to lag behind others in investigating cases officially declared that the incident cannot be branded as an "attack made by the north Korean military."
					
					 Moreover, experts cast doubt about the assertion that "it was done by the north," querying "Had the IPs used for the above-said attack belonged to U.S., Japan or south Korea, the U.S., Japan and south Korea should have been accountable for having created this confusion." 
					
					 Last year the south Korean authorities asserted that the "Cheonan" sinking case was "linked with the north" as the propelling body of the torpedo they claimed sank it was inscribed with letters "No. 1." Different circles of south Korea are now widely jeering at them, putting up questions as to how many letters "No. 1" were attached to the IPs which were used for attacking the Federation's banking computer network. 
					
					 In the final analysis, the story about "the north's involvement" spread by the group of traitors is creating fresh suspicion even in its own camp and it is, therefore, derided by people for being one more farce and charade. The above-said story floated by the group is aimed at saving its policy of confrontation with the north from shaking to its very foundation, weathering the crisis of its state administration fully disclosed in the closing years of its rule before and after the April 27 by-election and evade the responsibility for having stemmed the trend of national reconciliation, unity, peace and prosperity.
					
					 All the developments go to prove that the group of traitors' rumor that "the north was responsible for what happened" is one more farce staged against the nation to realize its sinister attempt and an anti-DPRK charade as ridiculous as the "Cheonan" warship sinking case. 
					
					 There are sayings that one should reflect on one's deed before pulling up others and one had better mind one's own business. 
					
					 The group of traitors should boldly discard its bad habit of finding fault with others. 
					
					 And it should immediately stop its reckless war exercises, waiting for someone's "contingency" to take place, unaware of its situation where it is threatened with total collapse. 
					
					 The group of traitors should bear in mind that the more anachronistic anti-DPRK farce and charade it orchestrates, the bitterer disgrace and fiasco it will face.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Meets American Reverend
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Meets American Reverend
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Reverend Franklin Graham, president of Samaritan's Purse, a non-governmental organization of the United States, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.
					 The reverend and his party arrived here by air that day.

articles.title: Talks Held between Korean, Swedish Party Delegations
articles.content:
Talks Held between Korean, Swedish Party Delegations
Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Talks were held between delegations of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Communist Party of Sweden in Pyongyang on Tuesday.
					 Present there from the WPK side were Secretary Kim Yong Il and officials of the C.C., the WPK and from the opposite side members of the delegation of the Communist Party of Sweden led by Chairman Anders Karlsson.
					
					 At the talks both sides informed each other of their party activities and exchanged views on the matter of further developing the relations between the two parties and issues of mutual concern.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Communist Party of Sweden
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Communist Party of Sweden
Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Communist Party of Sweden.
					 Anders Karlsson, chairman of the CPS, on a visit to the DPRK Tuesday handed the gift over to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Swedish Party Delegation Feted
articles.content:
Swedish Party Delegation Feted
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea gave a reception in honor of the visiting delegation of the Communist Party of Sweden at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Tuesday.
					 Present there on invitation was the delegation of the Communist Party of Sweden led by Chairman Anders Karlsson.
					
					 Secretary Kim Yong Il, Vice Department Director Ri Yong Chol and other officials of the C.C., the WPK, were on hand.
					
					 Kim Yong Il in his speech expressed thanks to the Communist Party of Sweden for extending support and encouragement to the WPK and the Korean people in their efforts to build a thriving socialist nation and achieve the reunification of the country.
					
					 The WPK values the friendship with the Communist Party of Sweden on the road of independence against imperialism and of socialism will make efforts to develop the relations between the two parties in the future, too, he noted.
					
					  Anders Karlsson in his speech said that President Kim Il Sung is a gifted great man, recollecting that he visited the DPRK and had an audience of the President.
					
					 He stressed that his party will extend full support and solidarity to the just cause of the WPK.

articles.title: Romanian Party Delegation Winds Up Its DPRK Visit
articles.content:
Romanian Party Delegation Winds Up Its DPRK Visit
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Socialist Party of Romania led by Vasile Orleanu, chairman of its Supreme Council, returned home on Tuesday after winding up its 11-day visit to the DPRK.
					 During the stay the delegation visited Mangyongdae, the Party Founding Museum, the Tower of the Juche Idea, the Grand People's Study House and so forth.

articles.title: Romanian Party Leader Praises DPRK
articles.content:
Romanian Party Leader Praises DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania who visited the DPRK as head of the party delegation, had an interview with KCNA on Monday.
					 Giving impressions of what he has seen in the DPRK during the stay, he said:
					
					 The dignity of socialist Korea shining all over the world is unthinkable without the august name of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The people's ideals are coming into reality in the DPRK. Miracles and innovations are being wrought in various fields including politics, economy and culture.
					
					 The credit for this success goes to the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Under his leadership the Korean people will lead a more affluent and civilized life.
					
					 We are sure that they, closely rallied around him, will successfully realize the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Expressing the will to strive for development of the friendly relations between the Socialist Party of Romania and the Workers' Party of Korea, the chairman said that his party fully supports the Korean people in the struggle to advocate independence and defend the gains of the revolution.

articles.title: Nepal Newspaper Delegation Arrives
articles.content:
Nepal Newspaper Delegation Arrives
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Press Chautari Nepal led by Chairman Gagan Bista arrived here by air today.

articles.title: National Scientific and Technological Exhibition Held
articles.content:
National Scientific and Technological Exhibition Held
						
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The 7th national scientific and technological exhibition in the field of machine designing took place in Pyongyang from May 5 to 10.
					 On display there were more than 300 machine designs presented by officials and working people in different units across the country, at least 50 designing research and support programs, 30 machine type designs for prize contest, etc.
					
					 During the period of the exhibition, its participants swapped successes and experience gained in designing new type machines and putting them into practice. It also involved a contest in computer-aided designing. 
					
					 Drawing the attention of the visitors were designs for variety of products and peculiar designs for industrial art conducive to improving the standard of people's living. They included designs for heat pump for using geothermal water, automatic sock packing machine, designs for general testing appliances of CNC-based horizontal milling machine, equipment for the production of new essential foodstuff and confectionary and household articles. 
					
					Designs for CNC-based machine tools and control apparatuses, papers on putting the methods of designing machines on a  scientific and standardization basis and three-dimensional machine designing support programs and others were highly appreciated at the exhibition for their importance in bringing the science and technology on a higher level.
					
					 A closing ceremony took place on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Jo Pyong Ju, vice-premier of the Cabinet and minister of Machine-Building Industry, Ri Ja Bang, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, officials concerned, officials, designers, creators, teachers and researchers  in the fields of machine designing and industrial art studios from across the country, education and scientific research institutions  and  workers and technicians of industrial establishments.

articles.title: Surgical Operations Applied to Vitreous Retinal Disease
articles.content:
Surgical Operations Applied to Vitreous Retinal Disease 
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Ophthalmic Hospital has applied surgical operations to the vitreous retinal disease.
					 The disease is known as incurable in the world. 
					
					 Different diseases cause vitreous retinal changes. 
					
					 Vitreous body is opacified and retina desquamated by inflammatory diseases like uveitis and retinal phlebemphraxis, and metabolic diseases like tumor, diabetes and leukemia.  
					
					 The hospital has treated the vitreous retinal disease by such operations as simple vitreous avulsion and scleral buckling. 
					
					 The operations have proved effective in treating many patients.

articles.title: Grand Magic Draws More Spectators
articles.content:
Grand Magic Draws More Spectators
						
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The grand magic performance is going on before full houses in the DPRK, evoking big response from people at home and abroad.
					 An endless stream of spectators visited the May Day Stadium, the venue of the mysterious grand magic.
					
					 Laser light, sound effect and other various depiction means are applied in the stage. The grand magic shows various works in succession, fascinating spectators.
					
					 The performance is drawing more Koreans and foreigners for it was created in a peculiar way in all aspects including contents, form, depiction and skills.
					
					 It lasts till May 18.

articles.title: Korea Rason Kangsong Trading Company
articles.content:
Korea Rason Kangsong Trading Company
						
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The Korea Rason Kangsong Trading Company, established in October Juche 86 (1997), has increased export of crabs. 
					 The exports, which satisfy the international commodity standard, are popular in Spain, Canada and other countries.
					
					 The company is fully furnished with modern fish processing and packing equipment.
					
					 It also has container transport and cold-storage trading vessels.
					
					 Kang Ul Son, director of the company, told KCNA that the company plans to sharply increase export through Rajin Port.

articles.title: Pyongyang Free from Pollution
articles.content:
Pyongyang Free from Pollution
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- It is widely acknowledged that Pyongyang is a clean and beautiful city free from pollution. 
					 Pyongyang is garbed in green with streets lined with trees of good species and flower beds.
					
					 There are many parks, recreation grounds and scenery spots like Moran Hill and Taesong and Ryongak mountains in Pyongyang.
					
					 The city has taken strict measures to keep rivers clean and prevent ground subsidence and pollution from automobile exhaust fumes, noise, vibration and bad smell.
					
					 Residential quarters are clothed with a green mantle.

articles.title: US and S. Korean Authorities' War Confab Blasted
articles.content:
US and S. Korean Authorities' War Confab Blasted
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Assistant secretaries of Defense and Foreign Affairs-level meeting of the U.S. and south Korea was held recently. It was reported that there was an agreement at the meeting on steadily developing the U.S.-south Korea "alliance" and it examined and appreciated the measure for maintaining the "military security posture" and the conferees agreed to boost the "cooperation for boosting the deterrent against the north" in the future, too.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: It goes without saying that the recent confab was aimed at keeping the U.S. forces in south Korea for an indefinite period and driving the puppet group into confrontation against the DPRK with an increased zeal.
					
					 The so-called "security" and "deterrent" vociferously touted by the U.S. together with the south Korean puppet group are nothing but sophism intended to justify their moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 Facts go to prove that the "moves to boost the deterrent against the north" on the lips of the U.S. and south Korean puppet group are no more than undisguised outbursts calling for escalating the military confrontation with the DPRK, increasing the tension and stepping up the moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK. In a word their recent huddle is a grave criminal act of driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase.
					
					 The situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is so tense that a war may break out any moment. This situation requires the army and people of the DPRK to get fully prepared to decisively frustrate the enemies' reckless campaign for confrontation with the DPRK. There is a limit to the patience on the part of the DPRK. Should the U.S. in collusion with the south Korean puppet group dares make an adventurous provocation against the DPRK, it will entail unpredictably catastrophic consequences.
					
					 The U.S. had better behave itself.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Priority to National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Priority to National Reunification
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- What is important in realizing the unity of the whole nation is to place the common interests of the nation above ideology and ism, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a by-lined article.
					 The unity of the whole nation is essential demand and decisive guarantee for realizing the cause of national reunification, the paper says, adding:
					
					 The supreme interests common to the Koreans are national reunification. When they give priority to the identity as a homogeneous nation and the reunification of the country, the interests common to the nation, they can get united as one despite of various differences.
					
					 The historic cause of national reunification will be surely realized when all the compatriots unite themselves as one, placing their common interests before anything else irrespective of differences in ideology and system, class and strata.
					
					 To give priority to the common interests of the nation is more important under the present situation in which reconciliation and unity between the north and the south presents itself as an urgent problem.
					
					 The bedeviled north-south relations bring no good but only harm to every member of the Korean nation. It is quite clear that this situation will lead to vicious cycle of confrontation and conflict and, furthermore, bring irrevocable scourge of war to this land.
					
					 If the north-south relations are deteriorated, it will be the Korean nation to suffer from this and the foreign forces to fish in troubled waters. The anguish of the compatriots is growing day by day due to the tragic division of the nation, but the south Korean authorities have rejected the national reconciliation and unity under the unreasonable pretexts and conditions. This is a treacherous crime.
					
					 All the Koreans should get closely united under the banner of national reunification, giving priority to the interests common to the nation and wage a more vigorous patriotic struggle for independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Minju Joson Labels US World's Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
Minju Joson Labels US World's Worst Human Rights Abuser
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Some days ago an unidentified  armed criminal fired a gun at random in Philadelphia City, Pennsylvania State, killing two people and seriously wounding eight others. Similar shocking incident took place in Oakland, California State.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: Many people are falling victim to gun-related crimes, a daily occurrence in the U.S. This reality clearly indicates what awful phase the human rights abuses have reached in the U.S.
					
					 All kinds of crimes including violence are rife in the U.S. which styles itself "a model of human rights". Consequently, people's lives are exposed to constant threat.
					
					 The U.S. beset with such serious human rights problems makes no scruple of abusing human rights in other countries, too.
					
					 Many innocent people are killed in Afghanistan and Pakistan in the course of the "operations to rout terrorists" conducted by the U.S. forces under the name of "anti-terror war."
					
					 As already known to the world, the U.S. committed the worst human rights abuses in overseas secret prisons including the prison at the U.S. naval base of Guantanamo such as putting prisoners to all kinds of torture, conducting tests on living bodies and mal-treating prisoners. These atrocities touched off towering indignation among the international community.
					
					 The U.S. has no qualification to say anything about the human rights. It is, however, taking issue with other countries over their "human rights situation" and using "human rights issues" as a lever for interfering in the internal affairs of sovereign states, behaving as if it were a "human rights judge" in the eyes of the world. This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The U.S. should stop behaving so in the international arena but admit all its human rights abuses and appear in the "human rights court" to face a stern judgment by history.

articles.title: Buddhist Masses Held at Temples across Country
articles.content:
Buddhist Masses Held at Temples across Country
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The "celebration of the birthday of Buddha, 2555 Buddhist Era and the north-south simultaneous Buddhist masses praying for the country's reunification" simultaneously took place at temples across the country on Tuesday.
					 Present there were office-bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea and its provincial, city and county committees, priests and monks of temples and believers. 
					
					 Rituals were made to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers called upon all the Buddhists in the north and the south and abroad to unite in Dharma-minded concord and turn out in the struggle to achieve the country's reunification under the uplifted slogan of "Let all Koreans in the north, south and abroad join efforts and bring a new phase of independent reunification!"
					
					 They also called upon all the Buddhists in the north, the south and abroad to intensify the practical actions to have the confrontation between the north and the south defused as early as possible, remove the danger of war on the Korean Peninsula, preserve the peace and actively promote dialogue and cooperation.
					
					 On the same day, a joint address of the north and the south was read out at the masses. It called for taking courageous practical actions to bring earlier the day of the country's reunification by regarding the north-south joint declarations, a reunification programme common to the nation, as a milestone of the country's reunification and pooling efforts under the banner of "By our nation itself.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Suppression of Youth and Students Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Suppression of Youth and Students Flailed
						
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration of south Korea released a statement on May 6 denouncing the puppet government for its fascist suppression.
					 On May 4 the police and the Intelligence Service searched houses and office rooms of members of the organization in Seoul, Taejon, Kwangju and Jeju areas and even the office room of the Democratic Labor Party in Jeju City and arrested four persons, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 All of them who were subject to the suppression by the authorities conducted activities for social democracy, stable people's living, peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula, opposed to the dictatorial regime.
					
					 The statement accused the "government" and the "Grand National Party" of getting frantic with retaliatory suppression on the strength of the "National Security Law", far from accepting the people's mind-set reflected in the returns of the April 27 by-election.
					
					 It urged the "government" to bear in mind what end the successive dictatorial regimes met while dampening the ardent desire of the people for democracy, people's life and peaceful reunification.
					
					 The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty in a statement on the same day assailed the puppet group for recklessly suppressing members of the youth and students organization in a bid to tide over the ruling crisis.

articles.title: Reinstatement of Participants in Campaign Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Reinstatement of Participants in Campaign Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Trade Union of south Korea in a commentary on May 4 demanded the puppet Ministry of Education, Science and Technology to reinstate all the participants in the campaign for issuing declarations on the situation who were dismissed unreasonably.
					 It was confirmed once again on the same day that unreasonable was the punishment meted out to the former chief of the Inchon Branch of the Teachers Trade Union who had been dismissed on charges of the participation in the said campaign, the commentary held.
					
					 This marked an occasion of proving once again that the campaign conducted by teachers of the union in 2009 was just, it added.
					
					 Recalling that the international community is showing increasing concern about the human rights situation in south Korea, the commentary urged the ministry to reinstate all the unreasonably punished teachers.

articles.title: Activities for Solidarity with DPRK Called for
articles.content:
Activities for Solidarity with DPRK Called for
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The Oceanic regional preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung on May 4 sent an appeal to the similar preparatory committees in other countries and regions and the bodies for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people in different countries.
					 Expressing full support for the decision adopted at the conference of leading officials of the international preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, the appeal called upon all the preparatory committees and the organizations for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people to widely organize colorful events to significantly commemorate the Day of the Sun, April 15, in 2012, and conduct positive activities for solidarity with the Korean people.
					
					 The appeal underscored the need to significantly form delegations to participate in the events to commemorate the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung to be held in Pyongyang in April 2012 and the ones marking the tenth anniversary of the meeting greeting the sun of the 21st century due to be held in the secret camp in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 It also appealed to all the preparatory committees and the bodies for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people to fully support the Korean people in their struggle to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country as part of the preparatory work to open the world conference for supporting Korea's reunification scheduled to be held in Pyongyang in April 2012.
					
					It also called for making good preparations for celebrating General Secretary Kim Jong Il's birthday, Feb. 16, 2012 to pay highest tribute to him.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Idea of Great National Unity Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Idea of Great National Unity Lauded 
Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Brazil and Switzerland posted on their Internet homepages articles dedicated to the 75th anniversary of the foundation of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland on May 3.
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "75 Years under the Banner of the Great National Unity". The article said that President Kim Il Sung advanced the idea of forming the anti-Japanese national united front from the steadfast Juche standpoint that the independence of the country should be achieved by the efforts of the nation, by the concerted efforts of the Koreans in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and wisely led the struggle to materialize it.
					
					 Under the energetic leadership of the President, May 5, 1936 saw the creation of the association, the Korean people's first anti-Japanese national united front organization, the article said.
					
					 The foundation of the association and its activities became a precious tradition of the great unity of the Korean nation, it said, adding that thanks to this tradition the Korean people could win victories in the work to build a new country, the Fatherland Liberation War, the postwar rehabilitation and construction and socialist construction and dynamically advance national reunification movement.
					
					The President's idea of the great national unity is being successfully carried forward by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, it said, pointing out in detail that there is a bright prospect for national reunification under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea also posted on their homepages articles dealing with the historical significance of the creation of the association.

articles.title: Many Firms Go Bust in Japan in Aftermath of Killer Quake
articles.content:
Many Firms Go Bust in Japan in Aftermath of Killer Quake
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The March 11 massive quake disaster forced 66 companies across Japan to go under by the end of April, Teikoku Databank, a credit agency, said Friday.

articles.title: CYLC Calls for Building Advanced Basic Organizations
articles.content:
CYLC Calls for Building Advanced Basic Organizations 
 Beijing, May 8 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China in a recent notice called for building advanced basic organizations and conducting positive activities to help them train good members.
					 The notice underscored the need for the organizations of the league at all levels to briskly conduct education in policies and practical activities and estimation and commendation so that they may be built into advanced basic ones and its members educated and led to become good members of the league.

articles.title: Oil and Gas Production in Syria Increased
articles.content:
Oil and Gas Production in Syria Increased
Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- During the first quarter of the year, Syria produced 34.828 million barrels of oil, with an increase rate hitting 4,700 barrels a day compared with the same period last year.
					 Gas production in the same period reached 2.664 billion cubic meters.

articles.title: Exports in Malaysia Increased
articles.content:
Exports in Malaysia Increased
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Malaysia's exports hit a new high of 64.06 billion ringgit (21.35 billion U.S. dollars) in March 2011, up 7.8 percent year on year, said the Malaysian International Trade and Industry Ministry in an announcement on Friday.

articles.title: France's Budget Deficit Widens
articles.content:
France's Budget Deficit Widens
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- France's budget deficit widened by 16.3 percent to 33.6 billion euros (48.83 billion U.S. dollars) at the end of March compared to the same month a year earlier, the Budget Ministry of this country said Friday.

articles.title: Cooperation among Countries
articles.content:
Cooperation among Countries 
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- Vietnam and South Africa on May 4 concluded a treaty on developing the bilateral cooperative relations in various fields including politics and economy.
					 Earlier on May 3, representatives of customs agencies from 16 Latin American and Caribbean countries met in the capital of Panama to 
					
					discuss legal measures needed to be taken to improve the control of smuggling.
					
					 They agreed to establish an efficient cooperation against smuggling.

articles.title: US Drone Attack Kills 13 in Pakistan
articles.content:
US Drone Attack Kills 13 in Pakistan 
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- The U.S. forces in Pakistan commit killing of Pakistanis almost every day under the signboard of "anti-terrorism."
					 At least 13 persons were killed and four others injured in a U.S. drone attack in northwest Pakistan's tribal area on Friday.

articles.title: Earthquake Jolts Indonesia
articles.content:
Earthquake Jolts Indonesia
 Pyongyang, May 10 (KCNA) -- A magnitude of 6.1 earthquake jolted the eastern area of Indonesia on May 6.
					  The epicenter was 75 km away from Gorontalo, North Sulawesi Province.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la función de estudiantes de universidad pedagógica
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la función de estudiantes de universidad pedagógica
Pyongyang, 10 de mayo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, presenció la función del grupo artístico de la Universidad Pedagógica Kim Hyong Jik. 
					Los miembros del grupo presentaron en la escena diversas piezas como el coro "Gloria a nuestro gran Partido", la poesía y canción "Ante el letrero con la firma del Líder padre", el drama corto "5 puntos", la narración y coro masculino "Nos llama el futuro de la gran potencia próspera", la poesía y coro "Pino verde en el monte Nam" y "Marcha de la juventud coreana". 
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los estudiantes de la universidad hayan ofrecido esta magnífica función con las piezas de gran valor cognoscitivo y educativo que reflejan la vida de sí mismos, el Dirigente apreció los éxitos alcanzados por ellos en esta ocasión y les agradeció en nombre del Comité Central del PTC.
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung escribió personalmente en el último período de su vida el letrero de esta universidad, recordó y agregó que anteriormente, los profesores, empleados y estudiantes de aquí lograron grandes éxitos en la educación, el estudio y la investigación científica para realizar de generación en generación el ideario Jiwon (gran propósito). 
					
					Los universitarios de la nueva generación formados en el regazo del Partido cumplen un papel importante en los campos principales de construcción de la gran potencia próspera, evidenciando prácticamente el futuro radiante de la Corea socialista, ratificó y enfatizó que está asegurado el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche porque el contingente de esos orgullosos estudiantes jóvenes garantizan el futuro de prosperidad nacional. 
					
					Formar a los estudiantes encargados del futuro de la patria como competente personal y pilar del país, dotado de ricos conocimientos, nobles virtudes y fuerte constitución física, es un problema fundamental que decide el porvenir de la revolución y el destino del país, dijo y presentó las tareas programáticas que servirán de guía en la educación de la universidad. 
					
					Disfrutaron la función junto con el Dirigente los cuadros directivos del Partido, el Estado y el Ejército Ri Yong Ho, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Thae Bok, Kim Kyong Hui, Kang Sok Ju, Jang Song Thaek, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Il, Pak To Chun, Choe Ryong Hae, Thae Jong Su, Kim Phyong Hae, Mun Kyong Dok, Ju Kyu Chang, U Tong Chuk y Ri Myong Su, los miembros de la Comisión Militar Central del PTC Kim Kyong Ok, Kim Won Hong y Kim Yong Chol, y el jefe de departamento del CDN, Hyon Chol Hae.

articles.title: Choe Yong Rim averigua la industria minera en provincia de Ryanggang
articles.content:
Choe Yong Rim averigua la industria minera en provincia de Ryanggang
Pyongyang, 10 de mayo (ATCC) -- El primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Choe Yong Rim, averiguó el día 4 el trabajo de la Mina Juventud de Hyesan. 
					Recorriendo el centro de enriquecimiento de minerales, hizo conocimiento detallado de los preparativos para activar la producción y convocó una reunión consultiva.
					
					El foro discutió los problemas prácticos para materializar cabalmente las tareas programáticas dadas por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il durante su visita de orientación y tomó las medidas correspondientes. 
					
					El día 5, el premier dirigió la Fundición de Metales no Ferrosos de Unhung y la Fábrica de Máquinas Mineras de Unhung, donde tomó las medidas eficientes.

articles.title: MINFAP desmiente teoría de "ataque cibernético del Norte de Corea"
articles.content:
MINFAP desmiente teoría de "ataque cibernético del Norte de Corea"
Pyongyang, 10 de mayo (ATCC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea hizo pública el día 10 la siguiente declaración condenando el vicio de las autoridades surcoreanas de acusar a la RPDC:
					Según trascendidos, desde el 12 de abril pasado, cayó en un gran caos sin precedente en la historia la "red de computación financiera" de la Federación Nacional de las Cooperativas Agrícolas del Sur de Corea. 
					
					Como consecuencia, llegan a cientos de millones las pérdidas y pasó tremenda pena a la vista del mundo el Sur de Corea.
					
					La banda de traidores surcoreanos realizó durante casi un mes la "investigación conjunta" sobre el caso y finalmente, publicó por conducto del Servicio de Inteligencia y de la fiscalía títeres la conclusión final de que el ataque cibernético fue "cometido por el Norte". 
					
					Como pruebas, ellos sostienen que el IP utilizado en el ataque es igual que el del Ministerio de Comunicaciones de la RPDC y se presume que el atacante es una unidad especializada en guerra cibernética si se toma en cuenta el control remoto preciso y sutil con que se ejecutó el ataque.
					
					Agregan que ese tipo de ataque sería difícil de ejecutar sin tremendos recursos humanos y materiales y no fue el simple para "sacar provechos particulares" como el robo de dinero o documentos sino el proceso repetido para la "destrucción indiscriminada". 
					
					Es una opinión sumamente absurda e infundada.
					
					  Los propios funcionarios del  "Consejo Central de las Cooperativas Agrícolas del Sur de Corea", víctimas directas, piensan que esa conclusión es "prematura" y carente de fundamentos científicos.
					
					  Hasta la Agencia de Información del ejército títere surcoreano tuvo que anunciar oficialmente que no se puede considerar el incidente como "ataque del círculo militar norcoreano".
					
					  Dudan esa teoría también los especialistas preguntándose que EE.UU., Japón o el Sur de Corea serían los autores de ataque si el IP usado fuera de sí mismos.
					
					  Cuando estalló el año pasado el incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan", las autoridades surcoreanas habían insistido en que el Norte estuvo involucrado porque en el propulsor del torpedo, que supuestamente hundió el buque, se leía la letra "1 pon".
					
					  Ahora, los habitantes surcoreanos de diferentes sectores ironizan la polémica teoría preguntando cuántos dígitos de "1" aparecen en el IP usado en la "red de computación financiera".
					
					  En fin de cuentas, la teoría de que "el Norte es el autor de ataque" levanta nuevas sospechas en la misma casa de títeres surcoreanos causando la risa sarcástica de todo el mundo que la ve como otro complot y farsa.
					
					  A pesar de eso, la camarilla de traidores surcoreanos la difunde obstinadamente para mantener el frágil cimiento de su política de enfrentamiento sobre la RPDC, reparar la crisis en el período posterior de su mandato que se hizo evidente antes y después de las elecciones suplementarias del 27 de abril y eludir la responsabilidad por haber impedido la corriente hacia la reconciliación y la unidad nacionales, la paz y la prosperidad.
					
					  Todos sus movimientos corroboran que la teoría en cuestión es otro complot antinacional y farsa anti-RPDC de igual calaña que el incidente de "Cheonan".
					
					  Hay un refrán que dice: "Sería mejor limpiarse la nariz que acusar a otros".
					
					  La camarilla de traidores surcoreanos debe dejar una vez por todas su vicio crónico de acusar a otros y suspender ahora mismo el malsano ejercicio de guerra, que libra esperando la supuesta "situación de emergencia" de alguien sin saber siquiera que su casa está a punto de colapso total.
					
					  Esa banda ha de tener bien presente que sus anacrónicos complots y farsas anti-RPDC no darán otro resultado que la vergüenza y la gran derrota de sí misma.

articles.title: Vasile Orleanu concede rueda de prensa a la ATCC
articles.content:
Vasile Orleanu concede rueda de prensa a la ATCC
Pyongyang, 10 de mayo (ATCC) -- En su entrevista concedida la víspera a la Agencia Telegráfica Central de Corea, el presidente del Consejo Supremo del Partido Socialista de Rumania, Vasile Orleanu, quien encabeza la delegación de esta organización de visita en Corea, expresó la impresión que tuvo durante su recorrido por varios lugares de Corea.
					No se puede pensar sin el nombre del Presidente Kim Il Sung en la dignidad de la Corea socialista que brilla hoy en el mundo, comenzó él y prosiguió:
					
					Corea es el país donde se realizan los ideales del pueblo.
					
					Se crean milagros e innovaciones en todos los sectores, tales como la política, la economía y la cultura.
					
					Todos esos éxitos son frutos valiosos de la sabia dirección del respetado Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Bajo su guía, el pueblo coreano tendrá en el futuro una vida más rica y civilizada.
					
					Estoy convencido de que los coreanos, unidos monolíticamente en torno al Dirigente, cumplirán con brillantez la causa de construcción de la gran potencia próspera socialista.
					
					Me esforzaréactivamente por desarrollar las relaciones de amistad entre el PSR y el PTC.
					
					Nuestro partido apoya con tesón la lucha del pueblo coreano por defender la independencia y las conquistas de la revolución.
